config.usageBody: Smart collection rules automatically include products that match the conditions. Each rule has: Column (product attribute, e.g. price, weight), Relation (e.g. greater than, equals), and Condition (the value to compare). Example: price greater than 100 includes products with price > 100. Add one or more rules and click Save.

- Code: [Customer Number]
